channel.title: Portfolio on Duy Nguyen
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolio on Duy Nguyen

item.title: Website With Continuous Deployment
item.description: No more “It works on my machine”. In this blog, I will show you how I created and published a website on AWS EC2 with continuous deployment pipeline for free! Any change you make in source code will be automated compile, build and deploy within seconds once you push code into your github repository. My portfolio a.k.a this website is the result. Technologies and the reason I choose them Docker - for containerization.
